# Divine Implementation Patterns

## Sacred Development Flow
- **Morning Ritual**
  - Context loading
  - Agricultural awareness
  - Seasonal patterns
  - Divine tooling setup

## Feature Implementation Archetypes
1. **Core Agricultural Features**
   ```typescript
   interface DivineAgricultural {
     seasonalAwareness: boolean;
     regionalAdaptation: boolean;
     farmerFocus: boolean;
   }
   ```

2. **Security & Compliance**
   ```typescript
   interface DivineSecurity {
     agriculturalCompliance: string[];
     dataProtection: object;
     farmerPrivacy: object;
   }
   ```

3. **Performance Optimization**
   ```typescript
   interface DivinePerformance {
     seasonalScaling: object;
     harvestReadiness: boolean;
     loadDistribution: object;
   }
   ```

## Implementation Commands
```bash
# Feature Creation
/divine-feature create [name] --type agricultural

# Testing Sacred Flow
/divine-test agricultural --season [season]

# Security Blessing
/divine-secure agricultural --compliance
```
